title: Mother of Wolves
description: A being of ancient power is beginning to stir, and a counterbalance must rise.For the realm of De Sikkari, the Year of the Golden Hart is a time of great awakening and change. This is particularly true for Kalla kyl’Solidor, also known as The Wolf Who Sleeps. A mage trainee of Cryshal Kanlon, Kalla seeks a magister — one who serves to protect their magi’s energy source. Travelling to the skycity, Kalla is appointed Arkaddian magister Aleister “Sky Fox” Balflear.After the city is attacked by a fire wyvern, the pair discovers that dragonkin have been enslaved and sent to destroy the realm. Kalla and Aleister find themselves propelled down a harrowing path — one that will determine not only the fate of the world, but their own.
author: J. Aislynn d'Merricksson
